name: Arcana Force VIII - The Hermit
text:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
Heads - You can send this face-up card and 1 "Arcana Force" monster from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 1 level 8 "Arcana Force" Synchro monster from your Extra Deck (this Summon is treated as a Synchro Summon).
Tails - You can send this face-up card and 1 "Arcana Force" monster from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 1 level 7 "Arcana Force" Synchro monster from your Extra Deck (this Summon is treated as a Synchro Summon).
